name: Mozzarella Chicken
steps: Place chicken (frozen or thawed) in baking pan. Sprinkle spices on top.
Spices: Garlic powder, onion salt, pepper salt, and paprika
Cover with foil and bake for 45-­‐50 min. Remove from over and put mozzarella cheese on top and place back
in oven until cheese is melted. Top with fresh tomatoes.
